import React, { useContext} from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {clearItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { CartContext } from '../../providers/cart/cart.provider' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem}) => { const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem const { addItem, removeItem, clearItemFromCart } = useContext(CartContext) return(
{ name }
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 { price }
clearItemFromCart(cartItem)}> ✕
)} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem : item => dispatch(clearItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
